Mr Justice Holman, sitting in London, allowed the challenges by the councils, declaring Mr Michael Gove had unlawfully failed to consult them before imposing the cuts. said David Letterman . "Being pummeled?" Anderson Cooper said. "I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before."
